# rgeo

An R package providing helper functions to work with coordinates. 

## Installation

You can install rgeo with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("rgeo")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(rgeo)

get_geo_info(
  .longitude = 11, .latitude = 48,
  .naturraum = naturraum_bayern,
  .boundaries = boundaries_bayern
)
```
